alert.note: Alert for Clearfield (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:27PM EDT until August 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 526 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plymptonville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... S.B. Elliot State Park around 540 PM EDT. Parker Dam State Park around 550 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Clearfield-Lawrence Airport. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Dubois Route 255 and Kylertown exits, specifically from mile markers 109 to 123. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
